Balance accurate to 0.1 gram and conforming to requirements of AASHTO M 231.

Weigh specimen in air to the nearest 0.1 gram.

2. 
Measure the height of the specimen at 4 approximately equidistant locations and average.  Record the average

3. 
Measure the diameter of the specimen at 4 approximately equidistant locations and average.  Record the average

4. 
Determine the maximum specific gravity of the specimen as specified in AASHTO T 209.
